beans.description:
This is an example of an HTTP IWriteConnector definition that may be used by an Openadaptor Java client to send data to an adaptor with a HTTP IReadConnector such defined in example/spring/connectors/http/servlet.xml.
To programmatically invoke the Openadaptor Java client you need the following in your Java program:
import org.openadaptor.client.OAClient; .... OAClient client = new OAClient("http-client.xml"); client.send("my data");
You need the following in your classpath:
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
Before executing the client program run server adaptor: http/servlet.xml

bean.description: This is a write connector that sends data to Openadaptor with an HTTP read connector
